title: As a user, I want to reset my password via email
description: Users who forget their passwords need a way to securely request a reset link and set a new password. The system should send an email with a secure token, and provide an endpoint to submit a new password using that token.
acceptance_criteria: User can submit their email to request a reset link.
System generates a secure, time-limited token for the reset link.
System sends an email containing the reset link (or logs it if email service is mocked).
User can submit a new password along with the valid token to update their credentials.
Token is invalidated after successful use or expiration.

title: As an admin, I want to manage platform users
description: Platform administrators need a dashboard backend to view all registered users and delete accounts that violate terms of service. These endpoints should be strictly protected.
acceptance_criteria: GET /admin/users returns a list of all registered users.
DELETE /admin/users/<username> allows deletion of a specific user account.
Only authenticated users with an 'admin' role in their JWT can access these endpoints.
Non-admin users receive a 403 Forbidden status.

title: As a user, I want to upload a profile picture
description: To personalize their accounts, users should be able to upload a small image file that will serve as their avatar across the platform.
acceptance_criteria: POST /profile/avatar accepts multipart form data containing an image file.
Endpoint strictly validates that the file is an image (e.g., JPEG, PNG) and under 2MB.
Images are saved securely on the server or a mock storage service.
GET /profile returns the URL or path to the user's uploaded avatar.
Users must be authenticated to upload.
